product_name: Nike Dri-FIT Feather Fleece T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: A great crew top for cool-weather running, the Nike Dri-FIT Feather Fleece T-Shirt wicks moisture and provides warmth to help you run farther and faster. Lyocell, polyester and spandex are blended together for soft warmth and comfortable stretch; fabric wicks sweat away for quick evaporation. Raglan sleeves allow unhindered shoulder movement. Secure zippered pocket at the right hip holds your small essentials. Rib-knit hem and sleeve cuffs provide a snug fit to keep warmth in. Thumbholes secure sleeves over hands for warmth. Internal audio loop helps keep cords out of the way. Nike Dri-FIT Feather Fleece T-Shirt has reflective highlights to improve nighttime visibility.
short_description: A great crew top for cool-weather running, the Nike Dri-FIT Feather Fleece T-Shirt wicks moisture and provides warmth to help you run farther and faster.
